comment.author: 24231207@N07
comment._content: Socialite who was also a noted vocalist.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content:
I wonder if this is the same socialite/vocalist.  Her career was in the late 1890's to 1906, when she married a prominent Dutch diplomat and became Mrs. Jonkheer J. Loudon.  If this is a contemporary photo from 1914, it seems like the singer would be older.  Plus, what is with the royal jewelry and flowers?
On the other hand, I can't find any other candidate.
